plot outline: Telegram service has been shut down forever. Postal service is waiting for the death knell. In this time one starts to drop letters in a letter box abandoned for years. These letters carry no address on them . The contents of the letters are suspicious and clearly express a conspiracy;a sinister one to murder someone. An unknown reason suddenly detaches a documentary film maker from her job, while a mysterious photographer makes way into her house.As the dark recesses of the characters are revealed the audience is hurled into a tale of deception,horror and faced with questions regarding the identity of the girl,the intentions of the photographer and how all of this is related to the letter box.Thus a game begins, a mystery unfolds.
title: Dakbaksho
plot: A psychological thriller revolving around Srija a documentary film maker and how her life changes following a series of unfortunate events.

Telegram service has been shut down forever. Postal service is waiting for the death knell. In this time one starts to drop letters in a letter box abandoned for years. These letters carry no address on them . The contents of the letters are suspicious and clearly express a conspiracy;a sinister one to murder someone. An unknown reason suddenly detaches a documentary film maker from her job, while a mysterious photographer makes way into her house.As the dark recesses of the characters are revealed the audience is hurled into a tale of deception,horror and faced with questions regarding the identity of the girl,the intentions of the photographer and how all of this is related to the letter box.Thus a game begins, a mystery unfolds.

Telegram services have been shut down for ever. Postal service is waiting for the death knell as well. At this time, one starts dropping letters in a letter box, which has been abandoned for many years. These letters carry no addresses on them. The contents of the letters are suspicious and clearly indicate conspiracy; a sinister one, to murder someone. Mean while, for a reason unknown, perhaps political interference, causes Srija, a renowned documentary filmmaker, detaches herself from her job, while a mysterious photographer makes way into her house. As the dark recesses of the characters are revealed the audience is hurled into a tale of deception, suspence and faced with questions regarding the identity of the girl, the intentions of the photographer and finally how is all this related to a letter box. And a game begins, a mystery unfolds.
